Question
========

SS-within in a one-way ANOVA and SS-residual in a bivariate regression represent both: 
Answerlist
----------
* The variance in Y scores not explained by X.
* The variance in Y scores explained by X.
* The total variance in Y scores.
* The variance explained minus the total variance. 

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
